body:
Comment 3 by **xianrenb**: 
If such decision should be left to the programmer, why should we use gofmt at all? Go
programmers should keep their own coding styles? The main reason of using gofmt is to
enforce a unique style across all the go programs. That means no matter which style the
same program is using, gofmt should output the same code. However, the current gofmt
allows the same program to have different style(one may add blank lines somewhere, while
others not), which is clearly not working in a way matching the original intention of
inventing gofmt.
